title: homosapienstrader
author: homosapienstrader
content: Hello Fellow hominidae, is the highest level for an ape to understand Austrian school of economics Â and turn into a libertarian agorist anarcho capitalist transhumanist day trader animal?Is this the path to pure logic or am just a low IQ animal?I was cognitive capable to make this vanitygen address 1HomoSLzBNqLhHrpDF2pLfSkU3M7uigxjQ , is this a proof of intelligence and consciousness?I drank a beer because I couldnt smoke weed because it was giving me headaches due my currently sinusitis state.The point is... what is me in this reality entropy? and much more important, what you going to do with this BTC hash above.Bitcoin changed everything forever, decentralized money, this is the most war effective anarcho capitalist achievement ever in pro humanity freedom against socialists low IQ evils.What am I? just a low IQ animal?Be conscious on this soup of particules fighting against animality in search for the perfect logic cognitive aligment to surpass homo sapiens limitations.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Seems to me that the essence of what we really are is really the pattern of everything in our life. This includes the 'bio-electrical' form that we have in combined brain and nerves. It might include something beyond this - like our spirit - that science hasn't been able to figure out yet... but that is included in the pattern that makes us up.
